name: Living Room
description: You are in the living room.

characters.name: Grandpa Nick
characters.description: Grandfather, he has the best war stories
dialogue: Back in my day we had zombie birds, they tasted delicious
I've survived five wars and one bird zombie attack, this is nothing
Hurry up and call the calvary
It's times like these when I wish I had good knees
You handle the skunks, I'm going to take a nap
this reminds me of a time back in 1908 or was it 1987.. nevermind, I don't remember

items.name: Hammer
items.description: This will probably be helpful to secure the house.

weapons.name: Baseball Bat
weapons.description: Louisville Slugger with nail spikes on the end

name: Office
description: You are now in the office, no time for work now!

characters.name: Sugey
characters.description: Wife, She knows where everything is in the house
dialogue: Don't hurt your hand with the hammer!
I just cleaned the house and now we are being attacked by skunks!
Those skunks better not dig up my new rose bush
After you are done playing with skunks put your clothes in the bin
Take off your dirty shoes! you're getting mud all over my floors

furniture.name: Desk
furniture.description: We might be able to find something useful in here.

items.name: Files
items.description: Looks like it's some birth certificates.

name: Basement
description: Maybe you should get down here soon to clean up.

furniture.name: Trunk
furniture.description: An old dusty trunk, anything good?

items.name: Gas Mask
items.description: The Skombies will never stop you now!

name: Bedroom
description: The main bedroom, maybe we can find something useful in here.

characters.name: Chris
dialogue: Yay, I don't have to go to school!
When I grow up, can I help you fight the skombies?
I'll be in my room making videos for my tiktok
I hope a skombie gets my english teacher, he gave me a C

furniture.name: Cabinet
furniture.description: Let's see if there is anything good in here.

weapons.name: Mothballs
weapons.description: small balls of chemical pesticide and deodorant

items.name: Orange Juice
items.description: This should boost your energy a bit

weapons.name: Kitten Litter
weapons.description: HMM.. This might come in handy.

items.name: Radio
items.description: We should use this to request help.

items.name: Wood
items.description: YES, it's time to start securing this house.

weapons.name: Leaf Blower
weapons.description: Device that propels air out of a nozzle to move debris
